attributes.action: Allow the exchange of Moroccan driving licences for UK licences
attributes.additional_details:
Many Moroccans living in the UK face unnecessary challenges when trying to legally drive, despite holding valid and verifiable Moroccan licences. Allowing a licence exchange would promote fairness, facilitate integration, and support mobility for work and daily life. Other non-EU countries already benefit from such agreements, and Morocco should be considered for inclusion.
We believe this is an important step for the growing Moroccan community in the UK.
Thank you.
attributes.background: We ask the UK Government to negotiate a reciprocal agreement with Morocco to allow holders of Moroccan driving licences to exchange them for UK driving licences without the need for a driving test.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Add Morocco to the list of 'designated countries' for driving licence exchange 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721633
